itemInfo.itemDesc: A crop that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.

item.name: Potato
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bartali Farm, Finto Farm, and Loggia Farm. It can also be obtained by Farming Potato Seeds using a Garden or by Gathering Potatoes using Bare Hands or a Hoe..

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
